en.title: LAMALA
en.LandingTitle:
Hotel Lamala is set in Becho in the Samegrelo
Zemo-Svaneti region
en.Desc:
At the hotel, all rooms include a balcony.
A à la carte breakfast is available every morning at Hotel Lamala.
en.BottomDesc:
Popular points of interest near the accommodation
include Chokhuldi, Bagvdanari and Mazeri.
